question: China is to construct First Earth-Moon economic Zone for Space research. The concept of Earth-Moon economy was articulated by which Indian Scientist?
explanation: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam, a scientist also known as the Missile Man of India who was also the 11th President of India, articulated the concept of Earth-Moon-Mars economy. His broad argument was that the Earth, Moon and Mars should be considered as single economic entity.China, it appears, has taken heed of Kalamâ€™s concept. It was recently reported that China is proposing to establish the first Earth-Moon economic zone.
